content: {"name": "Hope Villages of America (formerly Religious Community Services)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "For TEFAP food assistance no ID is required\n Serving: Pinellas County residents\n Reach atleast 45mins before the closing time", "email": "", "url": "https://rcspinellas.org/help/#food", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "700 Druid Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Clearwater", "state_province": "FL", "postal_code": "33756", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 27.9577161, "longitude": -82.7965982}, "phones": [{"number": "(727) 443-4031", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "22:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Children 17 and under, need Social Security cards."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Photo ID and proof of address is required for adults 18+"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
